This file contains an overview of all the vocabularies that are loaded in your CDM.
It is used to identify differences between the data sources that may impact a study.

- **vocabulary_id**: A short name of acronym for the vocabulary.
- **vocabulary_name**: The name of the vocabulary as defined in the vocabulary table.
- **vocabulary_reference**: If available a link to a website describing the vocabulary.
- **vocabulary_version**: The version of the vocabulary that is loaded in the CDM.
- **vocabulary_concept_id**: The concept_id of the vocabulary in the vocabulary table.
